taskDescription: Drag the words into the correct boxes
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
textField:
Focusing on what needs to be done over what one wants to do is *Collectivism*.
The belief that it's normal for bosses to have perks is *High Power Distance*.
The belief that one can reduce stress by organizing and planning is *High Uncertainty Avoidance*.
Prioritizing rules over relationships is *Universalism*.
Valuing and prioritizing community service and personal relationships is *Quality of Life*.
Believing that hiding one's emotions is dishonest is the *Emotional Orientation*.
Having friends that you only interact with on campus is the *Specific Orientation*.
The belief that a person's connections play more of a role in their success than their own qualities or efforts is the *External Locus of Control*
The belief that socializing is not wasted time is the *Polychronic Orientation*.
